channel.title: Windsurf on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti
channel.description: Recent content in Windsurf on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti

item.title: Two Cases of Prompts Which Don't Work
item.description: After a couple of months of coding using AI prompts, I found two cases where a particular prompt doesn’t work. Maybe they’ll start working sometime soon. Or, it is possible that they work with a different AI coding tool or LLM other than the ones I tried. Case I I have started to use Clerk for user authentication. It is really easy to use, but I have bumped into one small problem everytime I asked Windsurf to add Clerk authentication in a project.

item.title: How AI Started Writing Code for Me
item.description: I just realized that I haven’t blogged in four years, so it will be a while before my blog catches up with me. I feel like I am a different person now… Okay, I’ll get to the topic I was excited to write about. First look The first time I saw AI-assisted software development was a demo of a project called all hands . I was amazed that LLMs (large language models) could read bug reports from screenshots, fix and test code, and then deploy the changes too.
